title: **** you Riot Games
body: Everytime I play a match it tells me I've been afking....pretty sure I was there for the entire game so likee....tah fuk?

replies.body:
If you were there for the whole match and are still being marked as afk, I would recommend submitting a ticket to player support:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They should be able to tell you what's marking you as afk.
have a look at my recant post with picture proof
